original_text: Additionally, ensure that pagination begins from page 1—page 0 must be explicitly disallowed to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools.
units: Additionally , ensure that pagination begins from page 1 — page 0 must be explicitly disallowed to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools .
— page 0 must be explicitly disallowed to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools
to avoid indexing errors and alignment issues in downstream tools

original_text: A tactile page break marker "⠿⠿" must be inserted at the end of each page to assist with both manual review and automated parsing by assistive hardware.
units: A tactile page break marker " ⠿ ⠿ " must be inserted at the end of each page to assist with both manual review and automated parsing by assistive hardware .
to assist with both manual review and automated parsing by assistive hardware

original_text: This marker should be consistent and placed on a new line following the final line of each page.
units: placed on a new line following the final line of each page
following the final line of each page
